section.p: You are caught fast by the tendrils and dragged down into the embrace of the river mud. Your men are too appalled to do anything but watch as you die a slow death by drowning.

If you have a resurrection deal, turn to the entry marked for it on your Adventure Sheet. Otherwise your only option is to start again with a new character after first deleting all ticks and codewords in your Fabled Lands books. (You can start again at 1 in any book in the series.)
